title: Is there a point of contact (name) for adding a roadway to the NC roads system?
text:
Here's a link to a post about the steps you need to take to get a private road turned over to NC DOT control:



http://www.myreporter.com/2012/07/how-do-we-turn-a-private-road-into-a-state-maintained-road/



The form says it should be returned to the local engineer's office and New Hanover, Pender and Brunswick counties are in Division 3. Here is a link to a contact list for Division 3:



https://apps.ncdot.gov/dot/directory/authenticated/UnitPage.aspx?id=642
